com.glmapview

Class GLMapImageGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glmapview.GLMapImageGroup

  • public class GLMapImageGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    GLMapImageGroup is a bridge class, to work with GLMap internal representation of image group. Image groups used to display small set of images for the large number of locations. E.g. 10 kinds of bookmark at 1000 places on map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods
